channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Dreamweaver Desktop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Dreamweaver Desktop

item.title: CVE-2024-30314|2024-08-02T01:32:07.020Z -- adobe -- dreamweaver%20desktop
item.description: Dreamweaver Desktop versions 21.3 and earlier are affected by an Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability that could lead in arbitrary code execution by an attacker. Exploitation of this issue does require user interaction.

item.title: CVE-2024-30314|2024-06-04T17:38:32.709Z -- adobe -- dreamweaver%20desktop
item.description: Dreamweaver Desktop versions 21.3 and earlier are affected by an Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability that could lead in arbitrary code execution by an attacker. Exploitation of this issue does require user interaction.
